User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: A unique identifier for the user, typically the Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The display name of the user.

can_edit.description: A flag indicating whether the user has permission to edit entries.

id.description: A unique identifier for the entry, typically a Firestore document ID.

date.description: The ISO 8601 date string of when the entry was created.

mood_score.description: A numerical score from 1 to 5 representing the user's mood.

text.description: The text content of the journal entry.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the entry, linking to a User document.

/users/{userId}/entries/{entryId}.description: Stores the journal entries for a specific user.
